## Meet the team


### [Ziqian Xia](https://ziqian-xia.tech/)
:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%"}
![](pics/avatar.jpg){width=150}
:::

::: {.column width="60%"}

Ziqian Xia is a graduate student at Tongji University, China. Ziqian's research interests lie at the intersection of human behavior, technology, and environmental conservation. Ziqian's journey has been marked by a passionate pursuit of understanding the human dimension of climate change. Ziqian's  contributions to a myriad of publications, including *Nature Reviews Psychology*, *Journal of Cleaner Production*, *Environmental Research Letters*, and *Resources, Conservation and Recycling*.

Contact: [ziqian.research@gmail.com](mailto:ziqian.research@gmail.com)
:::

### Jianxun Yang

Jianxun Yang is the team's data maestro. With a knack for diving deep into datasets and extracting meaningful insights, Jianxun's role as a data analyst and co-author has been crucial. His analytical prowess ensures that the research is backed by robust data, making the findings both compelling and credible.
